ART & DESIGN SKILLS

Landscape Architecture

Spatial analysis and interdisciplinary problem-solving, empathetic/biophilic/universal design, conceptualization, hand sketches and drafting, scale modeling, model photography, universal design, and ethnobotany.

Fine Art

Fine art (pottery, watercolor, mixed media - from higher education/apprenticeship training); Japanese Sumi-E charcoal watercolor (3-year study, Japan). Bitwig and other music software.

Other Skills

Adobe Creative Suite and other illustration and drawing software; photography; acrylics, pastels, watercolors, and oils; clay and stone working. 3D design software.
